title: Leading Lady
description: Libby is a woman who always knows what she wants and how to get it. When she falls in love with a man who loves to argue and lives to win, all bets are off. Maybe they can find a way to win together.Leading Lady is full-length romance novel and can be read as a stand-alone. It is the second book by Christine Gordon. For readers 18+ due to steamy scenes.
author: Christine  Gordon
